TypeSignature.Value: public delegate string IssuerValidatorUsingConfiguration(string issuer, SecurityToken securityToken, TokenValidationParameters validationParameters, BaseConfiguration configuration);
.class public auto ansi sealed IssuerValidatorUsingConfiguration extends System.MulticastDelegate

Public Delegate Function IssuerValidatorUsingConfiguration(issuer As String, securityToken As SecurityToken, validationParameters As TokenValidationParameters, configuration As BaseConfiguration) As String
type IssuerValidatorUsingConfiguration = delegate of string * SecurityToken * TokenValidationParameters * BaseConfiguration -> string

Docs.param: The to be used for validating the token.
Docs.summary: Validates the issuer using additional configuration.
Docs.returns: The validated issuer to use when creating claims.
Docs.remarks: The delegate should return a non-null string that represents the issuer. If null, a default value will be used. If both and are set, takes priority.
